item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop - Magazine article
item.description: In 2022 I published an article in our Xpirit Magazine #13 about Azure Virtual Desktop. In this post I will give you a summary of the article.

item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop
item.description: Azure Virtual Desktop is Microsoft’s desktop and app virtualization Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) service that runs on Microsoft Azure. Azure Virtual Desktop allows for multi-session virtual machines with scalability on Azure. As an administrator, it enables you to have a single management experience for multiple Windows operating systems.
